All the colors are from the igniting of fireworks and the electrons in the ions moving to higher energy level due to the ignition. Depending on which energy level the electron started at and where it ends up at the end is what emits the light and the color. so having different elements in the ions is what determines the different energy levels electrons are willing to go to and thus ultimately will a emit a different light, with the different elements. To see more about this look up Flame test.
